
---
title: '联想陈劲：moto edge X30 预售关闭，五位数库存额度已全部售罄'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/12/2603a45f-62d6-4ce0-a9a5-81449e5cf5ce.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Sat, 11 Dec 2021 00:06:11 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/12/2603a45f-62d6-4ce0-a9a5-81449e5cf5ce.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="0390"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 12 月 11 日消息，今日早间，联想中国区手机业务部总经理陈劲通过社交媒体表示，<span class="accentTextColor">五位数库存额度的 moto edge X30 定金预售已全部售罄</span>，<span class="accentTextColor">暂时关闭预售，正在加紧生产</span>，12 月 15 日首销会再跟进一拨货量。</p><blockquote><p data-vmark="40a0">一早起来，发现五位数库存额度的 X30 定金预售已经全部售罄，有点小意外。大家的支持真的很热情，谢谢！暂时关闭预售，正在加紧生产，12 月 15 日首销我们会再跟进一拨货量。</p></blockquote><p data-vmark="78e9"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/12/2603a45f-62d6-4ce0-a9a5-81449e5cf5ce.png" w="922" h="334" title="联想陈劲：moto edge X30 预售关闭，五位数库存额度已全部售罄" width="922" height="297" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="539a">IT之家了解到，moto edge X30 于 12 月 9 日发布，售价 2999 元起，搭载骁龙 8 Gen 1 处理器，采用 X65 基带，将于 12 月 15 日开售。</p><p data-vmark="7bfb"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/12/86de57e5-cbe2-4adf-ab62-d8cee30a362d.jpeg" title="联想陈劲：moto edge X30 预售关闭，五位数库存额度已全部售罄" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="087c">相机方面，moto edge X30 配备超大底前后三主摄影像系统，包括 5000 万广角主摄、5000 万超广角微距主摄、6000 万前主摄。</p><p data-vmark="6f20">屏幕方面，moto edge X30 采用 6.7 英寸柔性 OLED 屏，支持 144Hz 高刷 + 576Hz 高触控，拥有 HDR10+ 全链路 10bit 色彩管理。</p><p data-vmark="9e13"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/12/c0726096-5cb9-4011-8b72-132587489696.png" w="983" h="767" title="联想陈劲：moto edge X30 预售关闭，五位数库存额度已全部售罄" width="983" height="640" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="d9dd">陈劲此前表示，moto 全球销量持续增长，今年已突破 5000 万台，预计 moto 全球智能手机出货量今年会突破 5300 万台。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%3dJF8BAOEJK1olXgAEUFleDUIVA18IGloUXQEGXF1bCksnRzBQRQQlBENHFRxWFlVPRjtUBABAQlRcCEBdCUoWA2gME1gTXwYdDRsBVXtfcRF_TAd2JmRYVxVaVFFufGl9YVJlUQoyV19fDEoWAG4IHGsWXwEAUlpYC0wnYAhmRwIRIFlZLhxtCE4nQQFVTwRLGlheChsDOEsUAm0OG1wVVQ4yVFlfAEseA28JG1MVVDYCXFltVAlFQi04K2sWbTYyVG5eOBV5AjwPHlwVD1RsDhddC0lVSzZmGF8XVAUDXG5fCUoVAV8&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380" data-jdid="100016592731"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/136216/32/25085/208209/61b0c411Ee9a1bd4c/9f23ded5c20c89d7.jpg" title="联想陈劲：moto edge X30 预售关闭，五位数库存额度已全部售罄" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name"> moto edge </div>
